text: Johnny Leeze (born John Glen; 31 December 1941 â€“ 25 October 2020) was a British actor. He was best known for playing Harry Clayton in long running British soap opera Coronation Street for a few months in 1985, and as Ned Glover on the British soap opera Emmerdale from 1994 to 1999. He was born in York, England. Leeze died on 25 October 2020 from COVID-19 in England at the age of 78. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in the United Kingdom Category:British movie actors Category:British television actors Category:British stage actors Category:Actors from York
title: Johnny Leeze
